glsa.title: mpg123: Buffer overflow vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: mpg123 decoding routines contain a buffer overflow bug that might lead to arbitrary code execution.

background.p: mpg123 is a MPEG Audio Player.

description.p: mpg123 contains a buffer overflow in the code that handles layer2 decoding of media files.

impact.p: An attacker can possibly exploit this bug with a specially-crafted mp3 or mp2 file to execute arbitrary code with the permissions of the user running mpg123.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All mpg123 users should upgrade to the latest version:
